TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit FileDialog extends System.Windows.Forms.CommonDialog
Public MustInherit Class FileDialog Inherits CommonDialog
public ref class FileDialog abstract : System::Windows::Forms::CommonDialog

summary.span: 顯示對話方塊，讓使用者可以從中選取檔案。

span.span: Displays a dialog box from which the user can select a file.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 是抽象類別，其中包含的一般行為和類別。 is an abstract class that contains common behavior for the and classes. 它不是直接使用，但包含這兩個類別的一般行為。It is not intended to be used directly but contains common behavior for those two classes. 您無法建立的執行個體。You cannot create an instance of . 雖然在類別宣告為公用，您無法從它繼承，因為它包含內部的抽象方法。Although the class is declared public, you cannot inherit from it, as it contains internal abstract methods. 若要建立對話方塊，以選取或儲存檔案，請使用或。To create a dialog box to select or save a file, use or . 是強制回應對話方塊。因此，當顯示，它會封鎖應用程式的其餘部分直到使用者選擇檔案。 is a modal dialog box; therefore, when shown, it blocks the rest of the application until the user has chosen a file. 當對話方塊會顯示為強制回應，沒有輸入 （鍵盤或滑鼠按一下） 可以在對話方塊中的物件發生除外。When a dialog box is displayed modally, no input (keyboard or mouse click) can occur except to objects on the dialog box. 程式必須隱藏或關閉對話方塊 （通常在某些使用者動作的回應） 之前呼叫程式輸入可能會發生。The program must hide or close the dialog box (usually in response to some user action) before input to the calling program can occur. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用衍生自類別，例如和，避免使用字串常值包含絕對路徑。When you use classes derived from , such as and , avoid using string literals containing absolute paths. 相反地，動態取得路徑使用一或多個下表中所述的技巧。Instead, dynamically obtain the path using one or more of the techniques described in the following table. 如果您想要讓使用者選取的資料夾，而非檔案，請使用。If you want to enable users to select a folder instead of a file, use the . 類型的應用程式、 應用程式相關聯的資料的儲存方式，以及存取檔案系統的原因而定，有許多種，您可以在其中建立目錄路徑。Depending upon the type of application, how data associated with the application is stored, and the reason for accessing the file system, there are many possible ways in which you can create a directory path. 下表顯示的技術以動態方式建立的路徑。The following table shows the techniques for creating paths dynamically. |路徑或程式類別目錄Path or program category|類別和成員，以使用Class and members to use| |------------------------------|------------------------------| |標準的 Windows 路徑，例如 Program Files、 MyDocuments、 桌面等等Standard Windows paths, such as Program Files, MyDocuments, the Desktop and so on|類別是最完整的來源，這些，透過它的靜態方法，例如，或透過方法，使用其中一種列舉值。The class is the most complete source for these, either through its static methods, such as , or through the method, using one of the enumerated values.| |與目前的應用程式的路徑Paths related to the current application|類別有靜態成員，以取得特定的路徑，例如， ， ，和。The class has static members to obtain certain paths, such as , , , and .

方法傳回暫存資料夾的路徑。The method of the returns the path of the temporary folder.

方法類別會傳回應用程式的目前執行的目錄。The method of the class returns the application's current executing directory.

屬性類別代表指定磁碟機的根目錄。The property of the class represents the specified drive's root directory.| |路徑儲存為應用程式設定Paths stored as application settings|存取對應的應用程式設定屬性的包裝函式類別衍生自。Access the corresponding applications settings property of the wrapper class derived from . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[適用於 Windows Form 應用程式設定](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md).| |登錄存放裝置Registry storage|某些應用程式會儲存在登錄中目錄資訊。Some applications store directory information in the registry. 類別具有和內容解析成值。The class has the and properties that resolve to a value.| |ClickOnce 應用程式ClickOnce applications|ClickOnce 應用程式，使用類別成員，例如，這會傳回指標的 ClickOnce 資料目錄。For ClickOnce applications, use class members such as , which will return a pointer to the ClickOnce data directory. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[存取本機和 ClickOnce 應用程式中的遠端資料](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d).| |國際應用程式International applications|為國際化應用程式，擷取的相對路徑部分字串資源應用程式中使用類別。For international applications, retrieve the relative path portion from a string resource in your application by using the class. 如需全球化和當地語系化的詳細資訊，請參閱主題[全球化和當地語系化](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md)。For more information about globalization and localization, see the topic [Globalization and Localization](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/index.md).| 請注意，您可以使用一或多個上述的技巧，建置完整的路徑。Notice that a full path may be built up using one or more of the described techniques. 例如，方法可能會用來取得 MyDocuments 資料夾路徑，則應用程式設定可用來新增相對子目錄部分。For example, the method might be used to obtain the path to the MyDocuments folder, then an application setting may be used to add a relative subdirectory portion. 類別包含靜態成員，以協助管理絕對和相對路徑的字串，而和類別有實際操作檔案和目錄，分別的靜態成員。The class contains static members to assist in manipulating absolute and relative path strings, whereas the and classes have static members that actually manipulate files and directories, respectively. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果應用程式的使用者變更的資料夾中，則在指定的位置會設定您的應用程式的目前工作目錄。If the user of your application changes the folder in the , then the current working directory for your application is set to the location specified in the . 若要避免這個問題，設定屬性`true`。To prevent this, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作並說明如何建立、 設定屬性，以及顯示對話方塊。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 此範例會使用方法來顯示對話方塊，並傳回。The example uses the method to display the dialog box and return the . 這個範例需要的表單具有置於其上和新增到該命名空間。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AddExtension { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AddExtension : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出對話方塊是否在使用者遺漏副檔名時，自動加入檔案的副檔名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the dialog box automatically adds an extension to a file name if the user omits the extension.

value.span: 如果對話方塊在使用者遺漏副檔名時會自動加入檔案的副檔名，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the dialog box adds an extension to a file name if the user omits the extension; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案名稱中加入的擴充功能取決於目前選取的檔案篩選器和值屬性。The extension added to a file name depends on the currently selected file filter and the value of the property. 如果屬性是`true`，從目前符合現有檔案的檔案篩選條件 對話方塊將加入的第一個延伸模組。If the property is `true`, the dialog box adds the first extension from the current file filter that matches an existing file. 如果沒有檔案符合目前的檔案篩選器，對話方塊中加入指定的副檔名屬性。If no files match the current file filter, the dialog box adds the extension specified in the property. 如果屬性是`false`，對話方塊中新增的第一個有效的檔案名稱副檔名，從目前的檔案篩選器。If the property is `false`, the dialog box adds the first valid file name extension from the current file filter. 如果目前的檔案篩選器不包含任何有效的檔案名稱副檔名，對話方塊中加入指定的副檔名屬性。If the current file filter contains no valid file name extensions, the dialog box adds the extension specified in the property.

permission.span: 新增擴充功能，如果使用者也可以省略它。

span.span: for adding an extension if the user omits it.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoUpgradeEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.AutoUpgradeEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出此 執行個體在 [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext] (~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] 上執行時是否應該自動升級外觀和行為。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance should automatically upgrade appearance and behavior when running on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

value.span: 如果這個執行個體時，自動升級的外觀和行為上執行時 [！INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)];否則， 。

span.span: if this instance should automatically upgrade appearance and behavior when running on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`、類別會具有[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]-樣式外觀和行為上[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]。If this property is `false`, the class will have a [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]-style appearance and behavior on [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]. 在[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]，此屬性沒有任何作用。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)], this property does not have any effect.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是`true`繼承和`false`繼承。The default value is `true` for an inheriting and `false` for an inheriting .

permission.span: 若要顯示的警告，如果檔案已經存在。

span.span: to display a warning if the file already exists.
Associated enumeration: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]，此屬性沒有任何作用。On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)], this property does not have any effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到 Windows Form 並呼叫`InitializeDialogAndButton`從表單的建構函式或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultExt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定預設的副檔名。

span.span: Gets or sets the default file name extension.

value.span: 預設的副檔名。

span.span: The default file name extension.

value.span: 傳回的字串不包含句號。

span.span: The returned string does not include the period.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當應用程式的使用者指定的檔名不含副檔名，將副檔名附加至檔案名稱。When the user of your application specifies a file name without an extension, the appends an extension to the file name. 使用的副檔名由和屬性。The extension that is used is determined by the and properties. 如果篩選條件中未選取和篩選條件指定的擴充功能，則會使用該副檔名。If a filter is selected in the and the filter specifies an extension, then that extension is used. 如果選取的篩選條件會使用萬用字元來取代擴充功能，則在指定的延伸屬性使用。If the filter selected uses a wildcard in place of the extension, then the extension specified in the property is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和資料流的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它也示範如何使用， ， ，和成員。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 這是完整的範例，準備好要執行時將它複製到您的專案。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定含有檔案對話方塊中所選取檔名的字串。

span.span: Gets or sets a string containing the file name selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 檔案對話方塊中所選取的檔名。

span.span: The file name selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案名稱包含的檔案路徑和副檔名。The file name includes both the file path and the extension. 如果沒有選取任何檔案，這個方法會傳回空字串 ("")。If no files are selected, this method returns an empty string (""). 當從使用類別，這個屬性代表儲存; 當從使用的檔案類別，它表示所開啟的檔案。When used from the class, this property represents the file being saved; when used from the class, it represents the file being opened. 這個屬性只能是檔案的一個選取名稱。This property can only be the name of one selected file. 如果您想要傳回陣列，其中包含的所有選取的檔案，在多個選取項目對話方塊中，使用名稱。If you want to return an array containing the names of all selected files in a multiple-selection dialog box, use . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用和資料流的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它也示範如何使用， ， ，和成員。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 這是完整的範例，準備好要執行時將它複製到您的專案。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBoxSaveFile/VB/form1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 若要取得或設定檔案名稱。

span.span: to get or set the file name.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property FileNames As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ FileNames { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得對話方塊中所有選取檔案的檔名。

span.span: Gets the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.

value.span: 型別的陣列，含有對話方塊中所有選取檔案的檔名。

span.span: An array of type , containing the file names of all selected files in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個檔案名稱包含的檔案路徑和副檔名。Each file name includes both the file path and the extension. 如果沒有選取任何檔案，這個方法會傳回空陣列。If no files are selected, this method returns an empty array. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者選取的映像的數目和其顯示在表單上的控制項。The following code example allows the user to select a number of images and display them in controls on a Form. 示範如何初始化，設定和屬性，以及讓使用者選取多個檔案，藉由設定屬性設定為 true。It demonstrates initializing an , setting the and properties, and allowing the user to select multiple files by setting the property to true. 這個程式碼範例假設您的表單已有控制項，名為`openFileDialog1`、名為`SelectFileButton`，和名為`flowLayoutPanel1`。This code example assumes that your form already has an control named `openFileDialog1`, a named `SelectFileButton`, and a named `flowLayoutPanel1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog.MultiSelect/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

span.span: to get the file names.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FileOk As CancelEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於使用者按一下 [檔案] 對話方塊上的 **[開啟]** 或 **[儲存]** 按鈕時。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks on the **Open** or **Save** button on a file dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，處理事件並使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the property, handling the event and using the method. 此範例執行時，使用者可以選取從圖形檔物件。When the example runs, a user can select graphics files from an object. 選取的檔案會顯示在表單中。The selected files are displayed in the form. 方法會強制重新繪製的每個圖形開啟的檔案格式。The method forces a repaint of the form for each graphics file opened. 在表單，其中包含執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼名為`PictureBox1`、名為`OpenFileDialog1`，和名為`fileButton`。To run this example paste the following code in a form containing a named `PictureBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, and a named `fileButton`. 呼叫`InitializePictureBox`和`InitializeOpenFileDialog`從表單的建構函式的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializePictureBox` and `InitializeOpenFileDialog` methods from the form's constructor or `Load` method. 執行範例時，請按一下按鈕顯示對話方塊。When the example is running, display the dialog box by clicking the button. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Filter : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前的檔名篩選字串，以決定出現在對話方塊中 [另存檔案類型] 或 [檔案類型] 方塊的選項。

span.span: Gets or sets the current file name filter string, which determines the choices that appear in the "Save as file type" or "Files of type" box in the dialog box.

value.span: 在對話方塊中可以使用檔案篩選選項。

span.span: The file filtering options available in the dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 針對每個篩選選項，篩選條件字串，包含描述的篩選，後面接著分隔號 (|) 和篩選模式。For each filtering option, the filter string contains a description of the filter, followed by the vertical bar (|) and the filter pattern. 不同的篩選選項的字串會以分隔號分隔。The strings for different filtering options are separated by the vertical bar. 篩選字串的範例如下：The following is an example of a filter string: `Text files (*.txt)|*.txt|All files (*.*)|*.*` 您可以加入到篩選器的數種篩選模式的檔案類型使用分號分隔，例如：You can add several filter patterns to a filter by separating the file types with semicolons, for example: `Image Files(*.BMP;*.JPG;*.GIF)|*.BMP;*.JPG;*.GIF|All files (*.*)|*.*` 使用屬性來設定篩選條件選項首先會顯示給使用者。Use the property to set which filtering option is shown first to the user. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作並說明如何建立、 設定屬性，以及顯示對話方塊。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 此範例會使用和屬性以使用者提供的篩選清單。The example uses the and properties to provide a list of filters for the user. 這個範例需要的表單具有置於其上和新增到該命名空間。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: format is invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int FilterIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.FilterIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定檔案對話方塊中目前所選取之篩選條件的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the filter currently selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 含有檔案對話方塊中目前所選取篩選條件之索引的值。

span.span: A value containing the index of the filter currently selected in the file dialog box.

value.span: 預設值為 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來設定篩選條件選項首先會顯示給使用者。Use the property to set which filtering option is shown first to the user. 您也可以使用的值之後顯示 [檔案] 對話方塊來執行視選擇的篩選條件的特殊檔案作業。You can also use the value of after showing the file dialog to perform special file operations depending upon the filter chosen. > [!NOTE] > 第一個篩選項目的索引值為 1。The index value of the first filter entry is 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作並說明如何建立、 設定屬性，以及顯示對話方塊。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 此範例會使用和屬性以使用者提供的篩選清單。The example uses the and properties to provide a list of filters for the user. 這個範例需要的表單具有置於其上和新增到該命名空間。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr HookProc (IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance native int HookProc(native int hWnd, int32 msg, native int wparam, native int lparam) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function HookProc (hWnd As IntPtr, msg As Integer, wparam As IntPtr, lparam As IntPtr) As IntPtr
protected: override IntPtr HookProc(IntPtr hWnd, int msg, IntPtr wparam, IntPtr lparam);
override this.HookProc : nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> nativeint

param.name: hWnd
param.span: 對話方塊視窗的控制代碼。

span.span: The handle to the dialog box window.

param.name: msg
param.span: 對話方塊所收到的訊息。

span.span: The message received by the dialog box.
Additional information about the message.
Additional information about the message.

summary.span: 定義為了將特定功能加入檔案對話方塊中而覆寫的通用對話方塊攔截程序 (Hook Procedure)。

span.span: Defines the common dialog box hook procedure that is overridden to add specific functionality to the file dialog box.

returns.span: 如果預設對話方塊程序處理訊息，就會傳回零，但如果預設對話方塊程序忽略訊息，就會傳回非零值。

span.span: Returns zero if the default dialog box procedure processes the message; returns a nonzero value if the default dialog box procedure ignores the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 攔截程序可讓使用者連接，或插入其他常式常式或應用程式，以便偵錯或增強功能。A hook procedure allows the user to connect or insert other routines into a routine or application for the purpose of debugging or enhancing functionality. 根據預設的攔截程序會將對話方塊中，以回應 WM_INITDIALOG 訊息螢幕上置中。By default, the hook procedure centers the dialog box on the screen in response to a WM_INITDIALOG message.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ InitialDirectory { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.InitialDirectory : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定檔案對話方塊所顯示的初始目錄。

span.span: Gets or sets the initial directory displayed by the file dialog box.

value.span: 檔案對話方塊所顯示的初始目錄。

span.span: The initial directory displayed by the file dialog box.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常會設定使用下列來源的其中一個：The property is typically set using one of the following sources: - 先前使用的程式中，從最後一個目錄或檔案操作可能是保留的路徑。A path that was previously used in the program, perhaps retained from the last directory or file operation. - 從持續性的來源，例如應用程式設定，讀取路徑或應用程式中的字串資源。A path read from a persistent source, such as an application setting, a or a string resource in the application. - 標準 Windows 系統和使用者的路徑，例如 Program Files、 MyDocuments、 MyMusic，等 (您可以使用來取得方法)Standard Windows system and user paths, such as Program Files, MyDocuments, MyMusic, and so on (which you can obtain using the method) - 路徑目前應用程式的相關，例如其啟動目錄 (您可以使用屬性來取得物件)。A path related to the current application, such as its startup directory (which you can obtain using properties on the object). 如需有關如何建立動態路徑的詳細資訊，請參閱類別概觀。For more information about creating dynamic paths, see the class overview. 在[!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)]，如果設定而非只目錄路徑的完整檔案名稱，為應用程式路徑，或從中使用者上次選取的檔案的目錄，將預設的初始目錄。On [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)], if is set to a full file name instead of just a directory path, the initial directory will default either to the application path, or to the directory from which the user last selected a file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作並說明如何建立、 設定屬性，以及顯示對話方塊。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 此範例會使用屬性來設定時，什麼的初始目錄是對話方塊中顯示給使用者。The example uses the property to set what the initial directory is when the dialog box is displayed to the user. 這個範例需要的表單具有置於其上和新增到該命名空間。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. [!code-cpp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic OpenFileDialog Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic OpenFileDialog Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Required to set the initial directory.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用實作並說明如何建立、 設定屬性，以及顯示對話方塊。The following code example uses the implementation of and illustrates creating, setting of properties, and showing the dialog box. 此範例會使用屬性，以確認對話方塊中關閉時，會還原先前選取的目錄。The example uses the property to ensure that the previously selected directory is restored when the dialog box is closed. 這個範例需要的表單具有置於其上和新增到該命名空間。The example requires a form with a placed on it and the namespace added to it. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SupportMultiDottedExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SupportMultiDottedExtensions : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定對話方塊是否支援顯示和儲存具有多個副檔名的檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the dialog box supports displaying and saving files that have multiple file name extensions.

value.span: 如果對話方塊支援多個副檔名則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the dialog box supports multiple file name extensions; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候使用者必須開啟，並儲存使用多個副檔名的檔案。Sometimes users must open and save files that use multiple file name extensions. 例如，應用程式資訊清單所使用的檔案[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]複雜的副檔名的部署技術結束 「。 .exe.manifest"。For example, the application manifest files used by the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment technology end in the complex file name extension ".exe.manifest". 此屬性設定為`true`可讓您設定多點延伸模組的屬性。Setting this property to `true` enables you to set the property to a multi-dotted extension. 如果是`false`，並指派的多點延伸，衍生的控制項，例如將只能使用字串中的最後一個延伸模組。If is `false`, and you assign a multi-dotted extension to , derived controls such as will only use the last extension in the string. 例如，將使用".manifest"而不是 「。 .exe.manifest"。For example, ".manifest" will be used instead of ".exe.manifest". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將檔案儲存副檔名為"。 data.txt"。The following code example saves files with the extension ".data.txt". 這個程式碼範例需要您的應用程式主機名為`saveFileDialog1`和名為`button1`。This code example requires that your application host a named `saveFileDialog1` and a named `button1`. [!code-csharp[SupportMultiDottedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SupportMultiDottedExtensions/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SupportMultiDottedExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/SupportMultiDottedExtensions/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定檔案對話方塊的標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the file dialog box title.

value.span: 檔案對話方塊的標題。

span.span: The file dialog box title.

value.span: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 該字串會放在對話方塊的標題列中。The string is placed in the title bar of the dialog box. 如果標題為空字串，系統會使用預設的標題，也就是 另存新檔 」 或 「 開啟 」。If the title is an empty string, the system uses a default title, which is either "Save As" or "Open". ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化，設定和屬性，以及讓使用者選取多個檔案，藉由設定屬性設定為 true。The following code example demonstrates initializing an , setting the and properties, and allowing the user to select multiple files by setting the property to true. 若要執行此範例中，貼上下列程式碼中表單，其中包含名為`OpenFileDialog1`和名為`fileButton`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form containing an named `OpenFileDialog1` and a named `fileButton`. 呼叫`InitializeOpenFileDialog`表單的建構函式中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializeOpenFileDialog` method in the form's constructor or `Load` method. 這個範例也需要`Click`事件`Button`控制項已連線到此範例中定義的事件處理常式。The example also requires that the `Click` event of the `Button` control is connected to the event handler defined in the example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#6)]

permission.span: 若要設定檔案對話方塊的標題。

span.span: to set the file dialog box title.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果編輯控制項包含任何項目，但是空間當使用者按一下**確定**，對話方塊會傳回檔案名稱，不論是否為有效。If the edit control contains anything but spaces when the user clicks **OK**, the dialog box returns the file name, whether it is valid or not. 沒有預設的延伸模組會加入至文字。No default extension is added to the text.
